org.gvsig.raster.lib.buffer.api

Interface Band

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ComplexObservable, ComplexWeakReferencingObservable, Disposable, Observable, WeakReferencingObservable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Band.BandByte, Band.BandDouble, Band.BandFloat, Band.BandInt, Band.BandShort
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBand, AbstractClippedBand, AbstractConvertedTypeBand, AbstractPaginatedBand, AbstractTiledBand, ClippedBandByte, ClippedBandDouble, ClippedBandFloat, ClippedBandInt, ClippedBandShort, ConvertedTypeBandByte, ConvertedTypeBandDouble, ConvertedTypeBandFloat, ConvertedTypeBandInt, ConvertedTypeBandShort, MemoryBandByte, MemoryBandDouble, MemoryBandFloat, MemoryBandInt, MemoryBandShort, PaginatedBandByte, PaginatedBandDouble, PaginatedBandFloat, PaginatedBandInt, PaginatedBandShort, TiledBandByte, TiledBandDouble, TiledBandFloat, TiledBandInt, TiledBandShort

    public interface Band
extends Cloneable, ComplexWeakReferencingObservable, Disposable

        Returns:
        the number of rows of the band

      • getDataType

        int getDataType()
        Gets the dataType. The possible data types are defined in BufferManager. The data type of the band can't be changed after being created.
        Returns:
        the data type

      • getNoData

        NoData getNoData()
        Gets the NoData value
        Returns:
        the noData of the band. Can't be null;

      • fill

        void fill(java.lang.Object value)
        Fills the band with a unique value. If the value is null, fills with NoData value. If NoData is undefined, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        value -
